document.full_text: french first lady carla bruni has fanned rumors she is pregnant, clutching a shawl to her belly during a newspaper interview and fending off inquiries with the words "my lips are sealed to protect something..."
document.title: french first lady fuels pregnancy rumors
lines_and_colors: french first lady carla bruni has fanned rumors she is pregnant, clutching a shawl to her belly during a newspaper interview and fending off inquiries with the words "my lips are sealed to protect something..."
